name: 3Shape Communicate
description: Dentists and Lab technicians can now conveniently communicate from any location 24/7 on-the-go. Share 3D scans, designs and images, save time and reduce remakes.  As a busy dentist or lab, getting access to your scans and designs on-the-go is important. With the Communicate App, you are not limited to your desktop or laptop and you can inspect your scans and design no matter where you are - all the time!  Share 3D scans and designs, share images and comments, approve and reject scans and designs, control your work, save time and reduce remakes.  Disclaimer: Older devices might not be able to show bigger 3D models due to memory limitations.  NOTE: Supported browsers for login are Chrome, Microsoft Edge and Samsung Internet.
